Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Tessellation \Tes`sel*la"tion\, n. The act of tessellating; also, the mosaic work so formed. --J. Forsyth. [1913 Webster]
tessellation n 1: the careful juxtaposition of shapes in a pattern; "a tessellation of hexagons" 2: the act of adorning with mosaic
